sentences.en: Can automatically generate batch unrestricted various Member No. Password!
sentences.cn: 可以批量无限制自动生成会员各类卡号密码!

sentences.en: Cities, if unrestricted, tend to coalesce into bigger and bigger conurbations.
sentences.cn: 如果不加限制，城市往往会联合发展成越来越大的集合城市。

sentences.en: Freedom to pursue extracurricular activities is totally unrestricted.
sentences.cn: 参加课外活动的自由完全不受限制。

sentences.en: Globalization while capital unrestricted flow, also causes crisis mobile speed unprecedented quick.
sentences.cn: 全球化在资本自由流动同时, 也使危机流动的速度前所未有的快.

sentences.en: God grants me the boon of vision unrestricted by time or space.
sentences.cn: 承蒙上帝的仁慈,对于我,现在已不再有所距离或障碍了.

sentences.en: Nearly all seats have an unrestricted view.
sentences.cn: 几乎在所有的座位上都可以看到完整清晰的画面。

sentences.en: Such goods are typically granted unrestricted tariff - free access.
sentences.cn: 对这些商品一般给予不受限制的免征关税的待遇.

sentences.en: The border was fully opened to trade and unrestricted travel in 1985.
sentences.cn: 直到1985年,才全面开放边境贸易并允许人员自由往来.

sentences.en: The Commissioner has absolutely unrestricted access to all the files.
sentences.cn: 特派员可以随意查阅所有文件。

sentences.en: Unrestricted — Net assets that are free of donor - imposed restrictions.
sentences.cn: 非限定—指捐献者无附加限定条件之净资产.

sentences.en: Unrestricted fares will be increased as much as $80 one-way.
sentences.cn: 弹性票价单程上浮最高可达80美元。

sentences.en: Unrestricted hotel development has ruined the coastline.
sentences.cn: 无限制地发展饭店已经使沿海地区遭到破坏.

sentences.en: Unrestricted verbs are usually stronger than those qualified by adverbs.
sentences.cn: 自主动词通常比那些被副词限制的动词灵活.

sentences.en: We have unrestricted access to all the facilities.
sentences.cn: 我们可随意使用一切设施。

sentences.en: We mustn't attempt unrestricted expansion regardless if it is within our capacity.
sentences.cn: 我们不能不顾自己的能力企图无限制地发展.

sentences.en: You're the kind of person that is naturally more unrestricted and wild.

words.tran_cn: 自由的；无限制的；不受束缚的

trans.tran_cn: 不受限制的，无限制的，自由的，敞开
trans.tran_en: not limited by anyone or anything
